Description: The cream of British and American crime writers combine for a must- have collection of linked short stories- With each writer picking up the story in their usual locale (Val McDermid in Manchester, Denise Mina in Glasgow, Karin Slaughter in Atlanta), each of these prestigious crime writers tells a gripping story (original to this collection) of murder, betrayal and intrigue. And running through each story is a charm bracelet- which brings bad luck wherever it's found... The must- have collection for all fans of British and American crime writing at it's best....
